summary: This code sets up an environment for running a Python script named "docplex_conflict_refiner.py" using Conda and redirects output without capturing it. The "send_ctrl_c.py" is used to pipe control-C signals to the script.

details.comment: This code sets up an environment for running a Python script named "docplex_conflict_refiner.py" using Conda and redirects output without capturing it. The "send_ctrl_c.py" is used to pipe control-C signals to the script.
